title: A Check On Commodities, Markets, The Economy
itunes:title: A Check On Commodities, Markets, The Economy
description:
Everett Millman, Precious Metals Specialist with Gainesville Coins, discusses the commodities market. Kristina Hooper, Chief Global Market Strategist at Invesco, talks markets and the economy. Chance Finucane, CIO of Oxbow Advisors, discusses three cyclical stocks to watch. Adam Coons, Portfolio Manager and Trader at Winthrop Capital Management, gives his current investment outlook. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
